If Trump were to clue his children in without getting them clearances, he would be committing the very crime that he accuses Hillary Clinton of engaging in: violation of the Espionage Act.
But for those in the bloodline to help Trump as he grapples with the future of our kingdom, they have to be armed with information.
If they are in the dark, they can do little more than hold his hand.
They need to be getting the same classified briefings he is hearing.
